road: A road appearing with varying width and curvature across vehicle-mounted views.
A road merging into perspective distortion in front, side, and rear directions.
A road reflecting wetness or dryness differently under multi-view lighting.
A road occluded by cars or buildings in one view and open in another.
A road turning sharply, captured at different moments in each view.
A road with broken markings aligned differently per camera angle.
A road fading into the horizon from front view but sharply bending in the side view.
A road under dynamic lighting conditions during vehicle movement.
A road partially blocked by infrastructure in one view, clearly visible in another.
A road with elevation change more apparent in lateral or rear views.
A road transitioning from highway to city captured across spatial views.
A road intersecting with alleys and side streets in composite perspectives.
A road segment visually consistent despite occlusion in some angles.
A road with shadows from buildings stretching across views.
A road featuring reflective textures in side vs. direct front shots.
A road embedded in dense urban context with vehicles on each side.
A road appearing narrower from rear-view due to camera focal compression.
A road captured during vehicle turns, producing drastic angle shifts.
A road segmented differently across view-based occlusion and illumination.
A road approaching a roundabout visible in side and front cameras.
A road framed by vegetation in one view and cars in another.
A road recorded under sunset illumination from opposite directions.
A road segment framed by shadows in lateral view and bright in front view.
A road under dynamic occlusion from pedestrians and other agents.
A road breaking into a fork captured from back-left and front-right views.
A road vanishing into tunnels or overpasses seen from side and back.
A road with dashed lines appearing disconnected across angles.
A road under construction visible differently per camera position.
A road flanked by parked cars on one side and a sidewalk on the other.
A road with visual continuity disrupted by view-specific blur or motion.
building: A building visible across multiple frames as the vehicle moves forward.
A building reflecting sunlight in front view and shadows in rear view.
A building occluded by trees in left view but clear from the right.
A building with static geometry, providing consistency in all angles.
A building exhibiting different silhouettes across vehicle turns.
A building facade captured in high detail from side-mounted camera.
A building appearing tilted due to wide-angle distortion in lateral views.
A building seen near a road junction across adjacent frames.
A building shifting position relative to road curvature in multi-views.
A building forming part of skyline in front and context in side view.
A building entrance visible from the right and shadowed from behind.
A building with unique shape preserved despite view transformation.
A building casting long shadows across views at low sun angles.
A building masked by vehicles in one view and isolated in another.
A building providing strong vertical cues in side and rear perspective.
A building close to the car appearing dynamic due to motion parallax.
A building rendered with varied lighting under moving viewpoints.
A building partially seen through narrow gaps in rear perspectives.
A building anchoring urban layout consistency in street-view modeling.
A building corner captured from both frontal and lateral cameras.
A building with windows reflecting the vehicle's side mirror.
A building overlaid with street signs or foliage in multiple views.
A building shifting left-to-right between front and back tracking.
A building defining semantic continuity for urban scene modeling.
A building partially masked by traffic poles in the rear view.
A building appearing larger or smaller based on relative vehicle pose.
A building with rooftop only visible from elevated camera frames.
A building distorted in rear fish-eye view but stable from the side.
A building consistently labeled across changing perspectives.
A building reappearing through gaps as the car moves past.
car: A car overtaking the ego-vehicle seen from side and rear simultaneously.
A car appearing closer in side view and far in the rear-view mirror.
A car making a turn seen across lateral and back-facing cameras.
A car static in side view but dynamic in frontal approach.
A car's tail lights visible in rear while head shape appears in front.
A car seen parked on the curb in one view and obstructing road in another.
A car reflecting nearby buildings differently in side and back angles.
A car passing by creating motion blur in side view but not in front.
A car gradually shifting across frames as it crosses the ego-vehicle.
A car distorted in wide-angle side view but well-aligned in front.
A car partially occluded by poles or foliage from one direction.
A car appearing smaller due to depth variation across angles.
A car seen from its left side in front view, right side in rear view.
A car interacting with a traffic light scene from multiple views.
A car forming semantic track across multi-view video sequences.
A car entering or leaving the frame based on view-dependent motion.
A car reflecting headlights differently in night driving frames.
A car visible in all views during overtaking maneuvers.
A car aligning with ego-lane differently across views.
A car blurred in motion from one view and sharp in another.
A car under occlusion by humans in side view but not rear.
A car appearing on intersection seen through front-left and rear-left.
A car showing detailed bumper texture in front-facing view.
A car tracked consistently across cross-view label propagation.
A car with distinct appearance in lateral due to shadow and reflection.
A car behind a truck visible only in side-mounted camera.
A car moving opposite direction seen briefly in side view.
A car contributing motion and semantic context in tracking task.
A car silhouetted at sunset viewed from multiple camera sources.
A car disappearing under overpass visible in rear frame later.
vegetation: Vegetation forming visual continuity across side and front views.
Vegetation distorted differently depending on lens and viewpoint.
Vegetation partially blocked by infrastructure in right camera view.
Vegetation with consistent height anchors perspective transitions.
Vegetation showing dynamic color tones due to lighting change.
Vegetation acting as static anchor in multi-view context.
Vegetation seen behind buildings from rear but not from front.
Vegetation positioned along sidewalks visible in lateral frames.
Vegetation blended into background under high sun illumination.
Vegetation outlined by car shadow in side view only.
Vegetation seen between parked cars in rear camera perspective.
Vegetation occluded by fence in one frame and isolated in another.
Vegetation defining boundary between road and property.
Vegetation shifting positions across consecutive turning views.
Vegetation forming visual clutter in front view only.
Vegetation appearing green in one view, shadowed in another.
Vegetation swaying with wind effect visible differently per view.
Vegetation enhancing spatial richness in semantic layout.
Vegetation obscured in the corner of rear-view footage.
Vegetation embedded in environment modeling across frames.
Vegetation reflected in vehicle windows from lateral angle.
Vegetation near pedestrian crossing across multiple views.
Vegetation overlapping with traffic signs in side views.
Vegetation masked by motion blur in driving sequences.
Vegetation outlining curves of the road seen from above.
Vegetation framing building outlines across views.
Vegetation providing vertical contrast in flat road layout.
Vegetation stretching along fences and walls in scenes.
Vegetation appearing dynamic due to ego-vehicle parallax.
Vegetation placed in virtual zones for scene simulation.

A human occluded by a pole in side view but clear in the rear frame.
A human walking away from the ego-vehicle in dynamic rear context.
A human only briefly visible in side camera while stationary.
A human casting a moving shadow across road in front view.
A human interacting with infrastructure differently in each angle.
A human standing near a traffic light visible from left perspective.
A human appearing distorted in close-range side camera shot.
A human occluded by a car in front but visible in lateral view.
A human present across consecutive multi-view driving shots.
A human walking toward the vehicle across multiple viewpoints.
A human segment forming consistent label despite varied position.
A human seen in pedestrian zone with multi-angle geometry.
A human partially masked by tree foliage in rear view only.
A human group spreading across front and side perspective.
A human crossing diagonally with clear appearance in each view.
A human in high-visibility clothing contrasting with background.
A human moving quickly across the ego-path, visible in all views.
A human waiting at crosswalk only seen in side-mounted frame.
A human with backpack walking left-to-right across front view.
A human silhouette against sunset forming cross-frame consistency.
A human behind a signpost seen more clearly from back view.
A human appearing pixel-small in distance and approaching gradually.
A human present near parked cars with variable occlusion.
A human captured across view-aligned semantic labels.
A human running past the ego-car, producing motion artifact.
A human rendered synthetically in virtual multi-view city.
